task: Using the Playwright MCP server, do the following: ## Context You are capturing a 'before' screenshot for this GitHub issue: - **Issue #27:** Make a Switch that turns the app into dark mode - **Description:** Make a switch on the top right corner that activates dark mode. Take a screenshot of the switch and also of darkmode being activated. ## Instructions The app is running at http://localhost:3000. Based on the issue description, figure out which page and interaction best demonstrates the relevant area of the app. This may involve: - Navigating to a specific route (not just the homepage) - Clicking buttons, filling out forms, or triggering UI states - Scrolling to a specific section If there is a login form blocking you, use 'testuser' / 'password'. Once you have navigated to the relevant state, take a full-page screenshot and save it to:
